story.description:
Implement HAIAMM Issue Management (IM) practice at Level 1 maturity.

## Practice Overview

**Function:** Operations
**Purpose:** Track and remediate security issues

## Level 1 Objectives

Establish basic security issue tracking and remediation process.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Issue tracking system configured
  - Use existing system (Jira, GitHub Issues)
  - AI security label/component created
  - Required fields defined
  - Workflow configured

- [ ] Severity definitions established
  - Critical: Active exploitation, data breach
  - High: Exploitable vulnerability
  - Medium: Potential vulnerability
  - Low: Best practice gap

- [ ] Remediation process defined
  - Assignment process documented
  - Timeline expectations set
  - Verification procedures established
  - Escalation path defined

- [ ] Regular review established
  - Weekly review for critical/high
  - Monthly review for medium/low
  - Trend tracking initiated
  - Stakeholder reporting

## Definition of Done

- [ ] All acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Issue tracking configured and tested
- [ ] Team trained on process
- [ ] First issues tracked through workflow

## OWASP Risks Addressed

- All risks (issue management supports remediation)
- ASI04: Agentic Supply Chain
- ASI08: Cascading Failures
- ASI10: Rogue Agents

## Resources

- [IM Practice Guide](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/docs/practices/IM-Software-OnePager.md)
- [GitHub Issue Templates](https://github.com/R3v3rzk1mur4/HAIAMM/.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/)

## Verifhai Integration

Use `/verifhai-practice IM` for issue management guidance.
